name: New Rights Group
body:
New Rights Group (NRG) is transforming the relationship between citizens and government. We are a group of the world's leading technologists, activists, designers, and strategists. Our projects leverage disruptive technologies to enable new forms of organization and engagement

## Our Projects build just, equitable and responsive societies.

NRG supports **open data for better elections** and helps citizens to demand **meaningful elections**.

NRG guides local and international actors to design **effective, innovative, and responsible technology interventions** that advance democracy and human rights.

NRG develops new approaches to **growing organic social movements**.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
